entry.title: New BIP32 structure
entry.summary: On April 23, 2014, a user named Luke-Jr commented that only a very niche user base needs funds isolated. However, another user named Pavol Rusnak replied that their users do need it and they are creating a BIP for them out of love.This exchange suggests that there is a group of users who require isolated funds, and that Pavol Rusnak's team is working to accommodate this need through the creation of a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal). It is not clear from the context what specific form this isolation will take or why these particular users require it.Overall, the conversation reveals the ongoing evolution of Bitcoin as a technology, with various stakeholders proposing changes and improvements to support different use cases and functionality.
